m
CAREER OBJECTIVE
Looking forward to be a part of an organization that will convert my potential into performance and
recognition for hard work, honesty and sincerity and thereby contributing to the growth of the
organization and myself.
PERSONAL PROFILE
I am a B.Tech Graduate in Information Technology  having about 2 years of work experience
both in India and in the U.A.E. I love to be a successful member of a team where I can contribute
my knowledge and skills. I wish to contribute meaningfully to the growth and success of the
organization by undertaking challenging assignments and delivering quality and timely results,
using my professional knowledge and skills. I have the ability to work under pressure, adaptability
to  changing  work  environment  and  accepting  challenges  in  a  competitive  environment.  Good
communication skills, openness to learning and believing in teamwork are some personal qualities I
have.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Lamprell  Energy  Ltd
June 2014 – August 2014
                         Temporary Staff (IT)
Designed and developed a store management software (Primesoft) to track real
time information for a departmental store.
Forms were developed that provides for data entry and queries using Oracle
Form Developer-a productive development environment for internet business
applications.
Modules developed for the project :
User Management
Supplier Management
Customer Management
Shop Management
Inventory Management
RESUME
Data storage and manipulation was performed in Oracle SQL Developer –an
Oracle database IDE.
Using  Oracle  SQL  developer,  performed  table  creation,  updating  and
manipulation, execution of queries, exported data into formats like XML, Excel,
PDF, etc., debugging and testing.
Oracle  Report  Builder  was  used  to  generate  reports  that  allowed  the
organization to centralize report processing and to better manage reporting.
Specific  SQL  statements  were  generated  using  query  builder  to  obtain
customized report data.
Reports generated were exported to formats like PDF and Word.
TECOM Investments, Dubai, UAE August  2011  –
March 2013
KPMO Analyst (April 2012 – March 2013)
Participated  as  well  as  led  requirements  gathering  for  key  stakeholders  at
TECOM.  Translated  these  requirements  into  a  system  interface  for  the
management of team improvement plans (TIP-ACTS).
Developed  workflows,  security  schemes,  permissions,  notifications  and
dashboards  in  JIRA  4.2.2  for  the  WMS  a  custom  built  organization  project
management tool. 
Performed customization of workflows and dashboards as well as configured
custom fields and screens.
Empowered users by coordinating and providing training and hands-on work-
sessions on using the WMS.
Assisted in the creation of dashboard views, filters and query reports. 
Developed detailed manual to improve user understanding of system and answer
FAQs.
Coordinated and worked closely with Group IT to document and trouble shoot
fixes to WMS. 
Performed research on portals and have added content to the PMO’s portal
page. 
Attended  trainings  and  vendor  presentations  on  SharePoint  2010  and
SharePoint 2013.
                        Trainee Intern (August 2011 – March 2012)
Received  JIRA  training  and  developed  workflows  for  various  areas  within
TECOM.
Developed pages and site map for the KPMO portal page.
Participated in requirements gathering sessions and strategy discussions for the
Work Management System (WMS). 
Sutherland Global Services, Kerala, India December 2010
– April 2011RESUME
                        Technical Support Executive 
Worked for McAfee to support Customers in the management and prevention of
hardware viruses. 
Successfully eliminated viruses, Trojans, spyware, rootkits and other malware
from Customers’ PC in allotted time period and adhering to SLA agreements.  
Effectively  applied  security  updates  to  Customers;  operating  system  and
reduced the risk of re-infection.
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS
LANGUAGES: 
Core Java, Oracle, ASP.NET, C#, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, C/C++, HTML, PL/SQL, XML,
SQL, MS Office (Excel, Word, Power Point, Access).
IDE: 
Microsoft  Visual  Studio  2010/2012,  Net  Beans,  Eclipse,  Microsoft  SQL  Server,  Oracle
JDeveloper, Oracle Form Builder, Oracle Report Builder, Oracle SQL Developer.
 ACADEMIC PROJECT
FINAL YEAR PROJECT:  (Tamil Nadu College of Engineering)
Fast Query Point Movement Techniques for Large CBIR Systems
Performing target search in content based image retrieval systems to find a specific image using
efficient query point movement methods.  This approach  enabled reaching any given target image
with fewer iterations in the worst and  average cases. A new index structure and query processing
technique was proposed to improve retrieval effectiveness  and efficiency.  Intended targets could be
retrieved even with poor selection of initial query points.
(Front end: Java 1.6 Back end: SQL Server 2000 )
COURSES ATTENDED
Diploma in Java Technologies (Java1.6, J2EE, JSP, Servlets & Oracle 9i database) from NIIT,
Kochi, India.
Certification Course in ASP.NET from G-TEC, Kochi, India.
Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2010 from New Horizons, Dubai.
Microsoft Excel 2010 from New Horizons, Dubai.
